document.forum_title: Latest News on newsR - Top Headlines and News Videos
document.discussion_title: Kayla Harrison Defends Olympic Title in Judo
document.topic_text: Kayla Harrison Defends Olympic Title in Judo Thursday, 11 August 2016 ( 7 hours ago ) Kayla Harrison became the first U.S. judo competitor to win a gold medal at consecutive Olympic Games . Rio 2016: Twitter hails brave Indian hockey team after 1-2 loss to NETHERLANDS Twitter 福澤 昭宏 RT @FoxNews : USA's Kayla Harrison successfully defends Olympic judo gold medal https://t.co/lWOYj5SAt2 https://t.co/S7KHgEE2mh 25 seconds ago Mr. Hart RT @FoxNews : USA's Kayla Harrison successfully defends Olympic judo gold medal https://t.co/lWOYj5SAt2 https://t.co/S7KHgEE2mh 26 seconds ago Paula Martino RT @FoxNews : USA's Kayla Harrison successfully defends Olympic judo gold medal https://t.co/lWOYj5SAt2 https://t.co/S7KHgEE2mh 35 seconds ago Shaun Jenkins RT @FoxNews : USA's Kayla Harrison successfully defends Olympic judo gold medal https://t.co/lWOYj5SAt2 https://t.co/S7KHgEE2mh 42 seconds ago
